data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Luo, Jiuyang, Fei, Yao, Yu, Haili (2015): First record of the genus Neostatherotis Oku from China, with the descriptions of four new species (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae: Olethreutinae). Zootaxa 3941 (2): 247-254, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3941.2.5
